import CollapseFilter from "./CollapseFilter" import CustomRangeFilter from "./CustomRangeFilter" import RangeFilters from "./RangeFilters" import useStreamersContext from "../hooks/StreamersContextHook" const FiltersSidebar = () => { const {streamers} = useStreamersContext() const viewCountOptions = ["Less than 10", "10 to 40", "40 to 100", "More than 100"] const followersOptions = ["Less than 10", "10 to 40", "40 to 100", "More than 100"] const adsQueuedOptions = ["Less than 10", "10 to 40", "40 to 100", "More than 100"] return (
} /> } /> } />
) } export default FiltersSidebar
